title: Build from source fails
body_html:
pytorch/aten/src/ATen/native/Convolution.cpp: In member function ‘bool at::native::ConvParams::use_mkldnn(const at::Tensor&) const’:
/home/ekostem/dev/pytorch/aten/src/ATen/native/Convolution.cpp:123:33: error: no match for ‘operator==’ (operand types are ‘at::Backend’ and ‘const at::DeviceType’)
   return input.type().backend() == kCPU &&
                                 ^

OS: Ubuntu 16.04.5 LTS
GCC version: (Ubuntu 5.4.0-6ubuntu1~16.04.10) 5.4.0 20160609
CMake version: version 3.12.0

Python version: 3.6
CUDA runtime version: 9.2.148
GPU models and configuration: GPU 0: GeForce GTX 1080 Ti
Nvidia driver version: 396.51
cuDNN version: Probably one of the following:
/usr/local/cuda-9.2/lib64/libcudnn.so.7.1.4
/usr/local/cuda-9.2/lib64/libcudnn_static.a
